channel.title: Need an advice
channel.description: Hey everyone. I'm absolutely new to java coding, but I really want to start coding rs servers. I need your advice, which base should I use for my server? I heard about project insanity and x-evolution looks great for me, but I don't know much about coding so please advice with comments. And maybe there is some coder that would like to help me if I'll have some problems in future? P. S. I have coded delta a little. Just added some teles, npcs, made them speak and changed items prices.

item.title: Need an advice
item.dc:creator: @zaibas zaibas
item.description:
@zaibas wrote:

[quote=“Adobe, post:44, topic:403945”][quote author=Shadowspkin link=topic=501002.msg3665376#msg3665376 date=1310588547]
Off topic: I like how this has 42 posts.

On topic: If you need some were to start learning java I can link you to some videos, 30h worth of java learning from a university. (Idk might be in my signature)

Edit: Yep its in my signature, “l2java”
[/quote]

Offtopic:
I got done watching those this morning, forgot when i started, (before i registered.)
Ontopic: If you need some more help along the road i can help you on msn: jeremywalls77@yahoo.com
(won’t spoon-feed you though)[/quote]
Okay. I’ll add you on msn, but later. I’ve got to go now see ya tomorrow

EDIT: btw if I’ll learn rsps coding will I be able to code something else than a private rs server? Like some small programs for pc or mobile phones?

Read full topic

PHP is extremely good for web development; but I do believe you are confusing yourself between Java and JavaScript.
[/quote]
Exactly what I said, Just so were clear Zaibas, Java has NOTHING to do with websites…[/quote]
I know. I’ve chosen Java. I mean rsps coding

item.title: Need an advice
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Coding Project Insanity is really fun for me because i always have trouble with it which gives me a challenge, and i love challenges :D. Just download PI, Delta, and Hyperion, and see what looks fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Need an advice
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:22, topic:403945”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=501002.msg3665233#msg3665233 date=1310583906]

[/quote]This dude shut down an incredible server with hundreds of players and sold his source for $300 each and many people bought it. You can even get donations by making a good server, $10 = phat, $20 = gs set, etc. Who said RSPS can’t give you money.

Even the most ridiculous server will eventually get donations.

Myth-Scape, the owner has $598 from donations and he’s been running his server for about month… maybe more. but it’s cause his server has alot of customs and the eco is messed up :x.[/quote]That’s the whole point, you could get a job by owning a server.
[/quote]

lol fail quote xD

I believe this* anwsers your questions/comments and concerns of opening a server.

Read full topic
